Name: Matt Reeves
Bio: Matthew George Reeves was born April 27, 1966 in Rockville Center, New York, USA and is a writer, director and producer.

Name: Kenneth Branagh
Bio: Kenneth Charles Branagh was born on December 10, 1960, in Belfast, Northern Ireland. He is an oscar-winning actor, director, and writer. He is most popular for his film adaptations of Shakespearean plays.

Name: Aaron Knee
Bio: Brothers, Aaron and Adam Knee are best known for their action oriented blockbusters.

Name: Jordan Peele
Bio: Jordan Peele is a comedian turned writer-director. He is known for co-writing and starring in Keanu (2016), opposite Keegan-Michael Key, and for directing Get Out (2017), one of the highest-grossing horror films of all time.

Name: Anthony Russo
Bio: Anthony J. Russo is an American filmmaker and producer who works alongside his brother Joseph Russo.

Name: James Cameron
Bio: James Cameron is a Canadian director best known for his epic Sci-Fi and dramatic films. His most notable films include Titanic (1997), The Terminator (1984), and Aliens (1986). Box-office juggernauts, his films have grossed over $6 billon worldwide.

Name: Byron Howard
Bio: Byron Howard was born on December 26, 1968 in Misawa, Japan. He is an animator, writer, director, and producer.

Name: Sian Heder
Bio: Sian Heder was born on June 23, 1977 in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA. She is a writer and producer.

Name: Joachim Trier
Bio: Joachim Trier is a Norwegian writer and director. He is known for Reprise (2006), Oslo, August 31st (2011), Louder Than Bombs (2015) and Thelma (2017). Trier also directed three short films, Piet√† (2000), Still (2001) and Procter (2002).

Name: Jonas Poher Rasmussen
Bio: Jonas Poher Rasmussen was born on May 19, 1981 in Kalundborg, Denmark. He is a director and writer, known for Flee (2021), Searching for Bill (2012) and What He Did (2015).
